title: Dazzle Watch Face for Wear
summary: It's like Bagua and also like a water drop
description: We are inspired by Chinese bagua. However the final design is not like a bagua. That's a funny story.Maybe we call this water drop more appropriate.This watch face could change the color when time is going.Features:✔ Animatic ✔ Analog only ✔ Resolution:320*320✔ Round & Square Watch Face✔ Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360,  LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatchIf you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
descriptionHTML:
We are inspired by Chinese bagua. However the final design is not like a bagua. That's a funny story.Maybe we call this water drop more appropriate.This watch face could change the color when time is going.

Features:
✔ Animatic
✔ Analog only
✔ Resolution:320*320
✔ Round & Square Watch Face
✔ Supported watches: Sony SmartWatch 3, Motorola Moto 360, LG G Watch, LG G Watch R, Asus ZenWatch

If you have some suggestion,you can follow our community:
Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1676804045872482
Google+:https://plus.google.com/106543864725528267317
comments: I like it The color change on the tear drops needs to be smoother and it would be nice to have the option to use an am/pm style clock but overall its well worth the dollar
